In India there is an enormous gap between healthcare supply and demand. What do you think are the major steps that can be taken by the government to improve patient care in the country?

As above said there is enormous gap between health supply and demand.The government should intervene in between to improve health care sector.Presently, in India because of various problems people are becoming sick and because of improper treatment by hospitals small problems also becoming serious and taking away the lives of the people.As it is became the primary need for people proper facilities are neccessary. Now-a-days healthcare centres are concentrating much on their profits rather serving the people.Though it became a costly affair people are willing to spend any amount of money on healthcare.People below the poverty line are not able to spend amount required for the treatment.It is very sad to know that many people are dieing at young age because of so many health issues.As a saying says Health is wealth proper care should be given to improve health sector.

Government should plan programs which will benefit all sections of the society.Government should takecare of implementation of planned programs.Government has introduced Aurogya Sri which is saving many lives.Likewise  more programs should be introduced to reduce the death rate which is very high.

Major Steps to be taken:

1. Govenment should establish healthcare sectors in rural areas.

2. It should educate people regarding health issues through training programs which helps them in questioning the Doctors about the treatment.

3.Govenment should appoint one Person who is responsible for checking the Prescription given by the Doctors which may include unneccessary tests and medicine.Because of his presence Doctors will not prescribe unwanted tests. 

4.Government should establish more hospitals to equal the supply with demand.

5.Government should estabhish call center which exclusively takes care of complaints given by patients regarding the hospital.Government should take proper action against those hospitals which are under consideration.

6.Government itself should decide about amount for each of the treartments based on the hospital.

7.Facilities in Government hospitals should be improved and regular feedback about the hospital should be collected from the patients as this helps in improvements.

 In most of the hospitals in India there is a improper treatment of patients as demand for them is more.Hospitals should treat patients in a good manner  as it helps them in recovering soon.Arogya Sri is the best program introduced by the government as it is helping so many people who are not wiling to spend more amount.Proper implementation should be done in each and every hospital to serve the need.
